Short instructions for the sick: Especially who by contagion, or otherwise, are deprived of the presence of a faithfull pastor. / By Richard Baxter. Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by Robert White, for Francis Tyton, at the three Daggers in Fleet-street: And for Nevill Simmons, book-seller in Kederminster., London, : Anno Dom. 1665.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
